name: SuperStar War
description:
SuperStar War is a turn-based RPG game that gets over 50 million downloads worldwide. This game takes you through the greatest anime series of all time by gathering your allies and weapons to unify your landlords. You will dive into the series in an age of heroes and legends.

Features:
• Detailed World Map
• Diverse character systems
• PK boss legend: varieties of unlimited PVP, PVE
• Customize your appearances and weapons
• Set up unique tactics and become the next strongest character in your village
• Build the fortress to protect villages from dark forces
• Complete missions by unleash your power
• Team up with friends and build bases to protect your landlords

In SuperStar War, no one will be left behind. Choose your favourite characters and pick up the full version to get exclusive treasures.
